title: Tired of toxic players and flame in normals?
body:
Looking for a group of people of any skill level who play to win but to also have fun.

Normals can often be decided in champ select ruining your next thirty minutes.

Join me and we can play together.

Add me - Pearl910

Bonus Points if you use voice chat.

replies.body: Can't voice chat - but I'm down for some toxicity free normals, I'll add u later :)

Sounds like a wonderful idea. Always struggle to find people, due to most playing on NA. 

I do sometimes use voice chat but I havent needed to for a while, since I mainly have to solo que ; o ;

My add is - Saris

Expect a friend request shortly!
